title: The World Cup Mix
content:
The first World Cup in Africa is under way… In celebration we are sharing two extra-special world cup mixes!

Using an idea stolen from a recent Gilles Peterson world cup radio show; myself, Juzzam and some other CITR friends have spent the past few weeks compiling two hour long mixes.

With 32 tracks representing every nation competing at the world cup, the two mixes showcase all types of music, from Ivorian Hip-Hop to Chilean Techno or Algerian Rai as well as a fair few surprises. Here are the track listings and links to download, so get listening!

    Disc 1

Group A – (Compiled by Taggerty)
1. France – Mc Solaar – Qui Sème Le Vent Récolte Le Tempo
2. Mexico – Mexican Institute of Sound – El Microfono
3. South Africa – Dj Mujava – Township Funk
4. Uruguay – Canario Luna – Celeste

Group B – (Compiled by Josh)
5. Argentina – Malon – Dale Negro
6. Greece – The New Hopes – I Found Love
7. South Korea – Kim Jung Mi – 어디서 어디까지
8. Nigeria – Chief Commander Ebenezer Obey and his Miliki Sound – Alowo Majaiye

Group C – (Compiled by Dan)
9. Algeria – Cheb Khaled – La Camel
10. England – LV ft. Josh Idehen – Lost
11. Slovenia – Jorge Ben – A Jovem Samba (Klasick Remix)
12. U.S.A – Madlib – Slim’s Return

Group D – (Compiled by Raisin)
13. Australia – Cut Copy – Out There On the Ice
14. Germany – Beau Mot Plage – Beau Mot Plage
15. Ghana – Masekela – Lagunta
16. Serbia – Bedak – Inje

Mix Link
Separate Tracks

Disc 2

Group E – (Compiled by Taggerty)
1. Cameroon – Manu Dibango – Soul Makossa
2. Denmark – Analogik – Frank Lysettewaltz
3. Japan – Budamunky – Strings Of Madness
4. Netherlands – Rednose Distrikt Ft. Benny Sings – Miss Moral

Group F – (Compiled by Gallits)
5. Italy – Mike Francis – Night Time Lady
6. New Zealand – Julien Dyne Ft. Mara TK – Layer
7. Paraguay – Los Blue Caps – No Me Mires Mas
8. Slovakia – Bez Ladu A Skladu – Hore Bez

Group G – (Compiled by Juzzam)
9. Brazil – Jorge Antunes – Cinta CIta
10. Ivory Coast – M.A.M feat Nayanka Bell – Hypothese
11. N. Korea – Lil In Suk – We Will Always Look Up To The Central Committee Of The Party
12. Portugal – The Beautiful Schizophonic – Un Etourdissant Reveil En Musique

Group H – (Compiled by Cutyourhair)
13. Chile – Ricardo Villalobos – Dexter
14. Honduras – Acidmunky – Shake It Off
15. Spain – El Guincho – Antillas
16. Switzerland – Dex Malente – Gipsy Kings feat. Analogik (Round Table Knights Remix)
